content: the cloudburst baby blanket is a striped crochet baby blanket pattern that is both easy and fun if you re a visual learner you ll be happy to know that the pattern includes a video tutorial on how crochet the half_double_crochet v_stitch that is used in this blanket including changing colours **materials ** to make one blanket you will need the following supplies -knit picks brava worsted weight yarn -2 5 skeins 545 yards denim colour a -1 5 skeins 330 yards white colour b -2 skeins 430 yards silver colour c -size h-8 5 mm crochet hook -scissors -tapestry/yarn needle for weaving in ends **measurements ** finished blanket measures 27 x 42 ﻿**skill level ** ﻿beginner
